column4: Hi, I want to install the latest KDE version (4.1) to some PCs (I have 2 PCs and 1 Laptop) but I don't have much bandwith (and I will not do apt-get install kubuntu-desktop on 3 PCs). Can I have the *.deb file so a single download can install to 3 PCs?
you can setup a local mirror and apt-get from that one
How can I start the local mirror??
